params._fee: Value of the fee in WEI

tag(uint256,address,uint256,address).details: Only a whitelisted publisher can execute this with the required fee unless the caller / sender has admin privileges.

params._hashtagId: ID of the hashtag being linked
params._nftId: ID of the nft to link from the above nft contract
params._tagger: the ethereum account that made the original tagging request

params._accessControls: Address of the access controls contract

calculateMintAndTagFee().notice: Calculates the fee that would be required to create a hashtag and tag an NFT asset in the same transaction

calculateTagFeeAfterDiscount().notice: Calculates the tagging fee after the discount is applied

getAllTagIdsForAGivenHashtag(uint256).notice: Gets the IDs of all tag events related to a hashtag

getAllTagIdsForAGivenNft(address,uint256.notice: Gets the IDs of all tag events related to an NFT

getAllTagIdsForAGivenPublisher(address).notice: Gets the IDs of all tag events that took place through a publisher

getAllTagIdsForAGivenTagger(address).notice: Gets the IDs of all tag events that were triggered by a given address

getTagInfo(uint256).notice: Retrieves information about a tag event

mintAndTag(string,address,uint256,addres.notice: Combines the action of creating a new hashtag and then tagging an NFT asset with this new tag.

setMintAndTagDiscount(uint256).notice: Allows the configuration of a discount percentage on the tagging fee

setTagFee(uint256).notice: Sets the fee required to tag an NFT asset

tag(uint256,address,uint256,address).notice: Tags an ERC721 NFT asset by storing a reference between the asset and a hashtag

updateAccessControls(address).notice: Admin functionality for updating the access controls

updateSplitter(address).notice: Admin functionality for updating the commission splitter

userdoc.notice: Contract that allows any ERC721 asset to be tagged by a hashtag within the Hashtag protocol
